reviewText:
I love the movie.  It has some quirky people who live in a quirky
town but they all love each other. A single women, who works in the hustle and bustle of the big city life, brother dies. She goes to this quirky town, where the brother lived, to the funeral and learns the love of her brother's son, the town and the son's father.
 She never wanted children.
I think it was beautifully written. It brings us down to real life
with a Sonete wrapped around it.
